fields.name: Description
fields.description: This is short description about the partner. The length of this description should not exceed 256 characters.

fields.name: LongDescription
fields.description: Long description for the partner's scenarios and integration.Length of this description should not exceed 2048 characters.

fields.name: SetupUri
fields.description:
URI of the partner website that can be used by Azure customers to setup Event Grid
integration on an event source.
